description: Contains health care remark code information from the service line level of an electronic remittance file. This information is sent in the LQ segment of an ANSI 835 Health Care Claim Payment/Advice file. This information is stored in the remittance image record.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: ID for the remittance image record containing the health care remark code information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LQ_SERVICE_LINE
columns.description: The service line associated with the health care remark code.

columns.name: CODE_LST_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The code list qualifier code. This is a standard code which indicates which code set the remark code belongs to.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Claim payment remark codes


National council for prescription drug programs reject/payment codes

columns.name: INDUSTRY_CODE
columns.description: The specific health care remark code.
